πάνθηρ pánthēr panter pan tier

𓃭 𓃬 Leo
𓃮 LeoPard panter ≠ πnTr 𓊹 Bander

𓍋𓃀𓏲𓄛𓏪 L’Banther:
𓍋 𓃀 𓅱 𓃰 El’phanter elefant
𓍋 𓃀 𓏲 𓃮 el Panther panter
𓍋 𓃀 𓏲 𓃮 le'panther 𓋁=lebanon,levante
𓋁 𓃀 𓏲 𓄛 𓏪 leopard

𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 head határ / front < panther pronto > proto > panter 𓃮 pard

𒉏𒊒 nim-ru נִמְרָא nimrā 𓌳 𓅱 𓃬 •nwmrw leopard
𒉏 pard in leopard ⇔ particoloured, mottled=pinto⋍panter!

𓎡𓇋𓇋𓃷𓄛 Chimpanther vs

𓃭 Letter 'L' as Leo:
(𓊪𓏏𓍯𓃭𓐝𓇋𓇋𓋴)| = Petro.Leomeis = Ptolemy(S)

Originally with deep L or 'Reo' as roar:

𓂋𓅱𓃭 RW/LW Löwe/lion/labiy' = אריה aRier
𓌳𓅱𓃬 LW with 𓌳=לLamed reading (sic)
